headline.main: Vegetarian, and Liking It, on the Web

docs.abstract: Bits and Bytes column on Internet sites related to vegetarianism (M)0
docs.lead_paragraph: I AM oppressed with a dread of living forever,'' George Bernard Shaw wrote when he was almost 85, adding, ''This is the only disadvantage of vegetarianism.'' Information on the advantages, like much else about vegetarianism, can be found on the Internet. The American Dietetic Association, for instance, points out a relationship between vegetarianism and reduced risk of obesity, coronary artery disease, hypertension, diabetes mellitus and some types of cancer (www .eatright.org/adap1197.html).
